0:
# remap app name from label
.custom_app_name = .pod_labels."app.kubernetes.io/name" || .pod_labels.app || .pod_labels."k8s-app" || "unknown"
# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)
1:
# remap app name from label
.custom_app_name = .pod_labels."app.kubernetes.io/name" || .pod_labels.app || .pod_labels."k8s-app" || "unknown"
# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)

0: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable
1: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

0:
# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 20
concurrent = 2

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"

0:
[couchdb]
single_node = true
max_document_size = 50000000

[chttpd]
require_valid_user = true
max_http_request_size = 4294967296
enable_cors = true

[chttpd_auth]
require_valid_user = true
authentication_redirect = /_utils/session.html

[httpd]
WWW-Authenticate = Basic realm="couchdb"
bind_address = 0.0.0.0

[cors]
origins = app://obsidian.md, capacitor://localhost, http://localhost
credentials = true
headers = accept, authorization, content-type, origin, referer
methods = GET, PUT, POST, HEAD, DELETE
max_age = 3600

0:
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "uid"
  replacement = ""
}
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "pod"
  replacement = "$1"
}
